s0618: Eleventh year, Dong Shu together with Wei attacked Song, obtained He Yang from Wei.
s0620: Twelfth year, Zhao Liang attacked Qi.
s0621: Thirteenth year, Han Xu served as general, attacked Qi.
s0623: Fourteenth year, Chancellor Yue Yi led Zhao, Qin, Han, Wei, Yan to attack Qi, took Ling Qiu.
s0624: Met with Qin at Zhong Yang.
s0625: Fifteenth year, Yan Zhao Wang came to visit.
s0626: Zhao together with Han, Wei, Qin struck Qi, Qi king defeated and fled, Yan alone penetrated deeply, took Lin Zi.
s0627: Sixteenth year, Qin again repeatedly struck Qi with Zhao, Qi people were troubled by it.
s0628: Su Li on behalf of Qi sent Zhao Wang a letter saying:
s0629: Your servant has heard that ancient worthy lords, their virtue and conduct was not spread throughout the realm, their teachings and compliance was not thoroughly among the people, their sacrifices and seasonal offerings were not frequently made to ghosts and spirits.
s0630: Sweet dew descended, timely rain arrived, the year's grain was abundant and ripe, the people had no diseases or epidemics, the multitudes considered it good, yet worthy lords planned for it.
s0631: Now your lordship's worthy conduct and meritorious strength is not repeatedly increased toward Qin;
s0632: resentment and poison accumulated anger is not originally deep toward Qi.
s0633: Qin and Zhao are allied states, with strength they conscripted troops from Han, does Qin truly love Zhao?
s0634: Or does it actually hate Qi?
s0635: The extreme of things, worthy lords examine it.
s0636: Qin does not love Zhao and hate Qi, it wants to destroy Han and swallow the two Zhou, therefore uses Qi to feed the world.
s0637: Fearing that affairs would not succeed, therefore sent troops to coerce Wei and Zhao.
s0638: Fearing that the world would fear itself, therefore sent hostages to establish trust.
s0639: Fearing that the world would quickly rebel, therefore conscripted troops from Han to intimidate them.
s0640: In name giving virtue to states, in reality attacking empty Han, your servant considers Qin's plan must come from this.
s0641: Things indeed have situations that differ yet troubles are the same: Chu long attacked and Zhongshan perished, now Qi long attacked and Han must perish.
s0642: Breaking Qi, your majesty and the six states divide its profits.
s0643: Destroying Han, Qin monopolizes it alone.
s0644: Collecting the two Zhou, west taking the sacrificial vessels, Qin privately monopolizes them.
s0645: Assigning fields and reckoning merit, your majesty's gains compared to Qin's, which is more?
s0646: Persuading ministers' plans say: 'Han loses San Chuan, Wei loses Jin state, the marketplace and court have not changed but calamity has already arrived.'
s0647: Now Qin and Zhao form a vertical alliance, south to attack Wei, north to attack Qi, three kingdoms fallen, Zhao gets two, Qin gets one.
s0648: Now Qin and Zhao form a horizontal alliance, east to attack Qi, west to attack the three Jin, three kingdoms fallen, Qin gets two, Zhao gets one.
s0649: Qin is the enemy of the four kingdoms, Zhao is the enemy of the three kingdoms.
s0650: Qin attacks Qi, Qi is weakened, then Qin turns back to attack the three Jin, the three Jin weakened, Qin then attacks Zhao.
s0651: Qin attacks the three Jin, the three Jin weakened, then Qin turns back to attack Qi, Qi weakened, Qin then attacks Zhao.
s0652: Qin attacks Qi first, then the three Jin, or attacks the three Jin first, then Qi, in the end Qin will attack Zhao.
s0653: Now Qin attacks Qi, Zhao attacks the three Jin, Qin gets Qi, Zhao gets the three Jin, Qin then attacks Zhao.
